name: Carla
description:
Explore, attack, and solve puzzles in the dungeon in this zelda-like game to reach the exit and return back home!

A Zelda: Link's Awakening inspired game for the Zelda-like Game Jam 2019 organised by @unidaystudio.

____CONTROLS____

AWSD - Movement
Left Click - Attack
E - Interact
F - Bombs

_____TEAM____

Victor Montero - @VMonty
Alex Martín - @hialexmartin
